problems.title: Check Vowel or Consonant
problems.description:
Given a character, determine if it is a vowel or consonant.
- Vowels: a, e, i, o, u (both uppercase and lowercase)
- Consonants: All other alphabets
- If not an alphabet, print "Not an alphabet"

Input Format:
Single character.

Output Format:
Print "Vowel", "Consonant", or "Not an alphabet".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
a

Sample Output
Vowel

Sample Input
B

Sample Output
Consonant

Sample Input
5

Sample Output
Not an alphabet

Explanation:
First check if it's an alphabet, then check if it's a vowel or consonant using nested conditions.
problems.constraints: Input is a single printable ASCII character
hintsList: First check if character is an alphabet. If yes, check if it's one of a, e, i, o, u (case-insensitive) for vowel, else consonant.
